context: Our authentic self is a deceitfully wicked self, full of sin and enslaved to its evil desires. The heart is deceitful above all things, And desperately wicked; Who can know it?

If we in the church want a cause to fight, let's fight sin. Let's reveal its hideousness. Let's show that Jeremiah was correct when e said: "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"

It's dangerous to trust our hearts. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it? It's also dangerous to put too much faith in our intellect as you can see by how often science textbooks have been revised. So, I would suggest you to have confidence in God.
If there were demons (and there aren't) they are not that bad if the human heart is more wicked. -Jeremiah 17:9"The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"

The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it? "I the Lord search the heart and test the mind, to give every man according to his ways, according to the fruit of his deeds."
"The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?" Don't "trust your gut" or "follow your heart."

I believe the Bible. It says they are locked away. Why try to find a way to believe some lies. We are our own problem. Self. The outer man. The heart is the most wicked thing on the earth. Not demons or Satan. Its us "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"
Mental Illness. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?

Education & accomplishment aren't the answers for such evil. America has a heart-sin problem, and only Jesus can cure that. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
And if the heart is the most deceitful and wicked thing. Demons are nothing to be feared. "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"
The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it? Accurate reflection on society and human nature.
Violence is everywhere and crosses all racial, economical and social barriers. It's not just inner-city kids people."The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"
If you heart or your self feel peace go for it otherwise. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
"The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?" Bible people believe everything so why not this verse? This should be double for pastors.

It was a general term. to be possessed with devils. It was for anyone who was insane. Or sick. Also remember the heart is the most wicked thing. So if demons did exist they are not as scary as the human heart. "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"

The heart is deceitful above all things, And desperately wicked; Who can know it? Matthew 4:4[4]But He answered and said, "It is written, 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God."
"Listen to your heart" is not Biblical. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
True !! We must always trust in the Lord and rely on Him, His plans, and His purposes. He never fails us. The heart is deceitful above all things, And desperately wicked; Who can know it?
For a better society a heart condition change is required. Acknowledgement & humility are key. The Bible says: The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
"The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; Who can know it?" Trust in the LORD JESUS alone!

He claims they felt uprooted. Feelings don't effect reality. They followed their feelings (heart) of wanting to be like God & chose an actual uprooting from safety and goodness. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
So true. This is why God said "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"Making idols out of the whims of the heart is a sure path to destruction.

The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; Who can know it? When mere human reason and feelings become the basis for discerning moral issues and social constructs, society is guaranteed to become self-destructive as the human heart is 'deceitful above all things' and 'desperately sick'.
Easy Bible. Jeremiah 17:9 [9]The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?

It proves God right when he said and Jeremiah 17:9 "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it? And to know that to be true all I have to do is look at my own heart

Yes God does know our hearts but what does scripture say about that ? The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it? Again .. I'm a scripturalist. I recommend you back up your beliefs by scripture and less generalizing
The world says, "Follow your heart!" The Word says, "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"

Disney and the church are in league together, all they say is "follow your heart" "stop following your head" yet the scripture says this: "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?"
"The heart is deceitful above all things, And desperately wicked; Who can know it?" Don't be deceived, do not follow your heart, but follow Jesus, He is the way, the truth and the life.

I understand these things make you upset. Praying that our Lord Jesus will give you understanding. Our flesh hates God's ways, but our Spirit embraces the Truth. The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked; who can know it?
